DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Health education program screen method , clinical breast examination examination cervix , may help reduce number woman develop breast cancer cervical cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study early detection breast cancer cervical cancer woman India .
DOC.brief_title: Early Detection Breast Cancer Cervical Cancer Women India
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To investigate effectiveness well plan health education program ( HEP ) low-cost screen method ( e.g. , clinical breast examination [ CBE ] visual inspection cervix paint 4 % acetic acid [ VIA ] ) down-staging reduce incidence mortality due breast cervical cancer . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm . - Arm I ( intervention ) : Participants undergo intervention comprise health education program ( HEP ) , clinical breast examination ( CBE ) , visual inspection cervix paint 4 % acetic acid ( VIA ) every 2 year 8 year . Participants also undergo active surveillance 8 year . - Arm II ( control ) : Participants receive one HEP . Participants also undergo active surveillance 8 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Resides 1 20 geographically defined cluster within slum Mumbai , India PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
